name: The Sea Dwellers
description:
The Sea Dwellers was adapted by Samudra Game.  I tried to name this artwork "The Sea Dwellers", it's like "The Mother Earth" but for the ocean. If we save the ocean, we save humans.
A healthy ocean regulates climate and reduces climate change impacts. Human activities are threatening the health of the world's oceans. Marine pollution comes from land-based activities. Marine life is facing constant threats and dangers and is slowly dying.


We can't change the past, but we can make our future better for all humankind.
